mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_cmt (iboard, iuser, ctnt) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboardcmt,A.iboard,A.iuser,A.ctnt,A.created_At createdAt, B.nm wrtier,B.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard=#{iboard} LIMIT #{startIdx},#{row}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board_cmt SET ctnt =#{ctnt}, updated_at = current_timestamp() where iboardCmt = #{iboardCmt} and iuser =#{iuser}
